system.description:
You lend your voice—whether through shouts, songs, or speeches—to your divine patron’s cause, blending faith and art. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You always have access to the Voice version of Art Specialty (when finishing a rest, you choose another option as well).
  • If you have the Silence Principle of Devotion, you can swap it out for a different Principle of Devotion when you take this feat.
  • When you would gain an Adventuring Trick or Sign of Faith, you can choose freely from either list.
  • You learn the thaumaturgy cantrip as your choice of a cleric or bard cantrip if you don’t already know it or another cleric or bard cantrip of your choice if you do.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in bard, 3 levels in cleric
